Articles.Content:
Hi Guys,

my 7 years old son is dreaming about new airports.

We found this: https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/topic/193362-actual-sites-airports-600-real-runways-for-rss-101-runway-ground-level-hotfix/

However, we couldnt find a way to successfully install the mod, as this mod has obviously been created for the 1.8.1 version of kerbal.

Does someone know how to get it running on the current (steam) version of Kerbal or how to download an older (steam) version of Kerbal. We are also ready to buy it from another source, if it is not possible on Steam.

Many thanks in advance,

Alex

I have not done it myself but here is info for good start.

 


I also think I read somewhere that you can do this, download version you want, then move it to another directory so it doesn't get measedmessed up by steam and youyou can play both old and new versionversions as you see fit.

 

Edited May 22, 2021 by Dientus
sry phone website doubles words sometimes
There is an airport mod that works on the current stock version of Kerbal. It has 19 additional airports for you to use.
Right click the game in steam. Click properties. Click betas Choose 1.8
